definition: thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with

sentences.english: Flush and store HILIC columns in water when not in use.
sentences.chinese: 冲洗和存储HILIC列水在不使用时。

sentences.english: Thoroughly rinse the turkey, and discard the brine mixture.
sentences.chinese: 倒掉浸火鸡的盐水，稍微冲洗一下火鸡。

sentences.english: The cleaning tube comprises an outer tube and an internal valve.
sentences.chinese: 该冲洗管包括外管和内阀。

sentences.english: The automatic pipet flusher is composed of a washing plug disk and a support mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 它由一个冲洗插盘和一个支承机构组成。

sentences.english: Cooking water is recaptured to flush toilets, for instance.
sentences.chinese: 比如，厨房用水可收集起来冲洗厕所。

sentences.english: Backwashing is one of the methods to maintain a filter bed clean.
sentences.chinese: 反冲洗是保持滤床清洁的方法之一。

sentences.english: Wash the instant noodles with warm water first, stir it and pour away the water containing the wax coating。
sentences.chinese: 用温水冲洗方便面，搅拌，然后倒掉含有蜡涂层的水。

sentences.english: I rinsed the shampoo out of my hair .
sentences.chinese: 我把头发上的洗发剂冲洗干净了。

sentences.english: This adjustment can be controlled from inside the cab while moving and operating the Flusher system.
sentences.chinese: 当移动冲洗器时，这种调节可在操作室内部进行调节。

sentences.english: The running of ais water antiflushing filter and common points for attention in it are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了气水反冲洗滤池的运行操作和一般注意事项。

sentences.english: After experiments, the cells should be washed entirely with drug-free buffer, ensuring that the cells return to natural condition.
sentences.chinese: 实验完成后，要冲洗细胞，保证细胞恢复到正常状态。

sentences.english: We are all excited that the teacher is going to teach us how to develop photographs.
sentences.chinese: 老师将教我们如何冲洗照片，为此我们都很兴奋。

sentences.english: we were meticulous in cleaning the car, washing and polishing every inch of it.
sentences.chinese: 我们小心翼翼地清洗汽车，将每一寸都冲洗和打蜡。

sentences.english: Rinse hair thoroughly with lukewarm water and towel dry.
sentences.chinese: 彻底地以微温的水和手巾冲洗头发。

sentences.english: Can automatically remove and small particles, unlike backwash strainers.
sentences.chinese: 不同于反冲洗过滤器，它可以自动清除大小颗粒。

sentences.english: The smaller pieces are suctioned after the bladder has been flushed. This usually takes many flushings with sterile saline.
sentences.chinese: 膀胱被消毒盐水冲洗以后会变的小一些。

definition: to clean (with water or alcohol)/to wipe and wash/to swab/to scrub
Yanshui town in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
Qingshui (place name)/Shimizu (Japanese surname and place name)
to cleanse/to scrub/to scour/to wash down/to erode/to wash away
